main.name: Sanjana Yadav
main.bio: Hi! I'm a sophomore at the University of Texas in Austin studying computer science in the Turing Scholars Program. I'm especially interested in full stack development, natural language processing, and applying these tools in society and government. In my free time, I like reading, painting, and photography!

resume.skillmessage: I have experience using a variety of languages from object oriented ones to low level systems languages, and have used natural language processing libraries many times. I also have experience with workflow and testing technologies.

education.school: University of Texas at Austin - Turing Scholars Honors Program
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.title: Courses (H = Honors)
education.description: Computer Architecture (H), Data Structure (H), Discrete Math (H), Robot Learning, Probability, Multivariable Calculus, Algorithms Design and Analysis Part 1 (Coursera)

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Set up and maintained Firebase database for the website. I also acted as our Team Lead and organized meetings, reviewed pull requests and mentored those on my team.

projects.title: Spotify Extension
projects.category: Full stack application that uses Spotify API and natural language processing toolkit to analyze albums on spotify

projects.title: Webcrawler
projects.category: A search engine that handles complex logical queries and crawls 9000+ webpages in seconds

projects.title: Secure Your Flight
projects.category: A full stack app that uses api and crowd-sourced data on security wait times to calculate when to leave for the airport

projects.title: Shell
projects.category: Created command-line shell that executes programs, redirects input/output, command history, and tab completion

projects.title: Multicycle Pipelined Processor
projects.category: Designed a multicycle processor that utilized pipelining, branch prediction, forwarding, and flushing

projects.title: FUN Compiler
projects.category: Developed compiler to change FUN programming language to x-86 assembly language and create an executable file

projects.title: Temporary ID Checker
projects.category: Full stack app that catalogs how many temporary IDs each student has and automatically emails and prints notifications

projects.title: Student 101
projects.category: A game with 4 levels where the user must move a robot using arrow keys to catch objects
